hero.title: Discover the beauty that sets you apart
hero.subtitle: Unique fragrances, quality cosmetics, and classy leather goods for every style and occasion.

paragraphs.1: Founded in 2005 by Roberto Filangeri, Filangeri Perfume inherits the family expertise in leather goods. The passion for quality is reflected in the selection of top-notch Made in Italy accessories, designed for clients who appreciate sophistication and long-lasting value.
paragraphs.2: Over the years, Filangeri Perfume has expanded its offerings to include a wide range of exclusive and personalized fragrances created to suit every taste, ensuring scents that reflect elegance and uniqueness.
paragraphs.3: We have introduced a selection of high-end makeup. Our team is available for professional and personalized consultations for every skin type and occasion.
paragraphs.4: Always attentive to innovation, we select high-performance cosmetic brands suitable for a male audience as well, with guaranteed results.
paragraphs.5: To complete our offerings, you will also find bags and accessories from the best Italian brands, including Valentino and Aeronautica Militare, allowing each client to express their style with elegance and authenticity.

paragraphs.1: Our store is located at 36 Santa Rita da Cascia Street, in Milan, on a wide street with ample free parking.
paragraphs.2: Additionally, we are located across from the line 95 bus stop, which connects our store with the Famagosta M2 metro station in Milan. You can easily reach us by public transport.

paragraphs.1: If you would like more information, do not hesitate to contact us.
paragraphs.2: We are open from Monday to Saturday, from 9:30 AM to 12:45 PM and 3:30 PM to 7:30 PM.
paragraphs.3: We are closed on Monday afternoons and Sundays.
